sql.statement:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BIG_ROCK ( ID_BIG_ROCK INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NM_BIG_ROCK VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, DS_BIG_ROCK VARCHAR(1000), TP_STATUS VARCHAR(20), DT_INSERT DOUBLE, DT_END DOUBLE, NR_LAT VARCHAR(100), NR_LNG VARCHAR(100)
)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BIG_ROCK_END ( ID_BIG_ROCK_END INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ID_BIG_ROCK INTEGER NOT NULL, DT_END DOUBLE, NR_LAT VARCHAR(100), NR_LNG VARCHAR(100) )
